page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF TRENANT AREA
page.content: THIS AREA HAS NO LARGE AREAS OF SETTLEMENT ALTHOUGH THERE ARE A FEW HOUSES AT REDGATE. CONSEQUENTLY THERE ARE NO SHOPS OR POST OFFICES. THERE ARE NO BUSES EITHER SO CARS ARE VERY IMPORTANT. THE INHABITANTS LOOK TO SURROUNDING VILLAGES SUCH AS ST.CLEER AND ST.NEOT AS WELL AS TO LISKEARD. EMPLOYMENT IS MAINLY IN AGRICULTURE OR FARMING. THERE IS ONE SMITHY. THERE IS ALSO A SCRAP YARD AND WEIGHBRIDGE. SOME ALSO TRAVEL TO WORK OUTSIDE THE BLOCK. ALL THE SCHOOLS ARE OTSIDE THE BLOCK BUT THERE ARTE PRIMARY SCHOOLS AT ST. CLEER, ST.NEOT AND DOBWALLS. THE SECONDARY SCHOOL IS AT LISKEARD. THE HEALTH SERVICES ARE ALSO IN LISKEARD, AS ARE THE DENTISTS. THE NEAREST GENERAL HOSPITAL IS IN PLYMOUTH.
